description: Looking for the best garlic bread recipe? Follow this recipe for perfectly golden, crisp and buttery garlic bread. Warning - you'll keep going back for more!
name: Garlic Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup continental parsley leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place butter in a heatproof, microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, covered, on high for 20 seconds or until butter softens. Stir in garlic paste, parsley, pepper and salt until smooth and combined.
Brush cut sides of baguettes with butter mixture. Press baguette halves back together and wrap in foil to enclose.
Bake for 12 minutes or until bread is golden and crisp. Cut into pieces and serve.
